Package de.pifpafpuf.web.html

simple classes to generate an HTML DOM tree intended for generating HTML output.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmptyElem
    is a node for an empty HTML element in an HTML DOM tree intended for HTML code generation.
    Html
    is a node in an HTML DOM tree intended for HTML code generation.
    HtmlPage
    to be used as a root node for an HTML page tree.
    HtmlText
    is a text node within an HTML DOM tree.
    TextUtils
    assorted utilities needed for generating HTML.
    Translator
    translates text strings into replacemend strings and wraps them into a HtmlText objects.

Package de.pifpafpuf.web.html Description

simple classes to generate an HTML DOM tree intended for generating HTML output. For hints how to use these classes check the README on github.
